issue.title: kick.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://kick.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fkick.com)
### Comment
> Whenever I have AdGuard DNS on, Kick app does not load the content. I have also tried it on my Mi Box (Android TV). It works on browser, though, so it seems to be something specific to the app.

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/4u1zdyh4mfwgwcs4g4g0o0wk8cc0ocg6hbs21f7po0.png?nc=1)
</details>
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled</summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/900jvml1ihc8cs88kos4g0os0kwks0odz3qytwtqy8.png?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Device or router settings
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server
System version: | `Android TV and Galaxy S25 (latest build)`
Browser: | The Kick app does not load with AdGuard DNS.

issue.title: Valid Websites Erroneously Added to Block List

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

Mullvad 2025.14 beta 1

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.brightedge.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Sites shoud be removed form Adguarrd DNS list: https://v.firebog.net/hosts/AdguardDNS.txt

1. https://www.brightedge.com/
2. https://umami.is/

These are legit companies and those are there main company websites.

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
